data.md:MetaData: Core diameter: 5.4 cm. Area: 60 ha. Raised bog. Physiography: depression between moraines, former lake. Surrounding vegetation: graslands, above 700 m Piceeto-Abietetum. Vegetation formation: Picea-Abies-Fagus, most Fagus, then Abies.
Beiträge zur Vegetationgeschichte Tirols VII: Das Hochmoor Schwemm bei Wachsee
